example.eg: I hope Max is sure about his guarantee that the package will arrive by Saturday.
example.egtrans: 我希望马克斯能肯定自己的保证，包裹会在周六之前到达。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保证, 担保, 承诺

example.eg: The waffle iron comes with a 5-year guarantee.
example.egtrans: 这款华夫饼铁模配有5年保修期。

example.eg: There is no guarantee that the medication will be effective for everyone.
example.egtrans: 无法保证药物对每个人都有效。

example.eg: The new law guarantees free school meals to all children under five.
example.egtrans: 新法律保证所有五岁以下儿童都享有免费校餐。

example.eg: Tina guaranteed that the store would still be open.
example.egtrans: 蒂娜保证那家店还会营业。

example.eg: I guarantee you that I will have the contract ready by Friday.
example.egtrans: 我向你保证我会在周五前将合同准备好。

example.eg: The deposit guarantees you a place on the course.
example.egtrans: 这笔押金可以确保您能就读该课程。

example.eg: The store guaranteed the phone for one year.
example.egtrans: 这家商店为这款手机保修一年。

example.eg: I didn't have to pay for repairs because the washing machine was still under guarantee.
